title: The Lost City of Atlantis
description: A team of archaeologists discovers evidence of the legendary lost city of Atlantis. As they dive deeper into the ocean's mysteries, they uncover secrets that might have been better left buried.

title: Echoes of Tomorrow
description: In the year 2150, a scientist creates a device that can hear echoes of future events. When the device predicts a global catastrophe, a race against time begins to prevent the inevitable.

title: Whispers in the Attic
description: After moving into an old Victorian house, a family begins to hear strange whispers coming from the attic. What they discover will challenge everything they believe about the supernatural.

title: The Detective's Last Case
description: A retired detective is pulled back for one final case when a series of murders mimics his most famous unsolved mystery. As the body count rises, he realizes the killer might be closer than he thinks.

title: Roses in Winter
description: Two strangers meet during a snowstorm that leaves them stranded in a small mountain town. As days pass, they discover a connection that transcends their different worlds and past heartbreaks.

title: The Dragon's Apprentice
description: In a world where dragons and humans coexist, a young orphan becomes the unlikely apprentice to the oldest and most powerful dragon. Their bond will be tested as ancient enemies resurface.

title: The Last Laugh
description: A struggling comedian finds a mysterious notebook that contains jokes that make everyone laugh uncontrollably. As his fame rises, he discovers the dark price of using the notebook's power.

title: 1863: Divided Hearts
description: During the American Civil War, two brothers find themselves fighting on opposite sides. Their letters home tell a story of divided loyalties, shared memories, and the hope for reconciliation.

title: The Countdown
description: A mysterious countdown appears on digital screens worldwide. No one knows what happens when it reaches zero, but a group of strangers must work together to solve the puzzle before time runs out.

title: Backstage Shadows
description: Behind the glamour of a Broadway production lies a web of rivalries, romances, and ambitions. When the lead actress disappears on opening night, the understudies must step into more than just her role.
